description:
This section is for gameplay items. It goes from 2~500.
501 beyond are quest items.
name: -----NOTE-----

description:
Heals a friend's HEART and JUICE, and 
raises ALL STATS for the battle.
name: SNO-CONE
note:
<IconIndex:49>

<follow action>
animation 214: target
eval: const ttarget = BEAF.get_entity(target.name()); BattleManager.addText(BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['ATTACK_STAT'] + BEAF.get_determiner('AP', ttarget) + ttarget.TRANSLATION + BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['STAT_UP'])
wait: 2
eval: const ttarget = BEAF.get_entity(target.name()); BattleManager.addText(BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['DEFENSE_STAT'] + BEAF.get_determiner('AP', ttarget) + ttarget.TRANSLATION + BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['STAT_UP'])
wait: 2
eval: const ttarget = BEAF.get_entity(target.name()); BattleManager.addText(BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['SPEED_STAT'] + BEAF.get_determiner('AP', ttarget) + ttarget.TRANSLATION + BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['STAT_UP'])
wait: 2
eval: const ttarget = BEAF.get_entity(target.name()); BattleManager.addText(BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['LUCK_STAT'] + BEAF.get_determiner('AP', ttarget) + ttarget.TRANSLATION + BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['STAT_UP'])
wait: 2
wait for animation
</follow action>

description:

description:
Good for your bones. Heals 10 JUICE
and increases DEFENSE for the battle.
name: MILK
note:
<IconIndex:60>

<whole action>
animation 213: target
wait: 120
animation 214: target

 if target.isStateAffected(96) 
   remove state 96: target
   add state 97: target
 else if target.isStateAffected(95)
   remove state 95: target
   add state 96: target
 else 
   add state 95: target
end
eval: const ttarget = BEAF.get_entity(target.name()); BattleManager.addText(BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['DEFENSE_STAT'] + BEAF.get_determiner('AP', ttarget) + ttarget.TRANSLATION + BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['STAT_UP'])
wait: 60
</whole action>

description:
Deals small damage to all foes
and reduces their SPEED.
name: JACKS
note:
<is Toy>
<IconIndex:61>

<follow action>
wait: 60
animation 219: target

 if target.isStateAffected(105) 
   add state 106: target
   remove state 105: target
 else if target.isStateAffected(104) 
   add state 105: target
   remove state 104: target
 else 
   add state 104: target
end
eval: BattleManager.addText(BEAF.format('{AD^:SPEED}{SPEED_LONG} de tous les ennemis baisse.'))
wait: 30
</follow action>

description:
Deals damage to a foe and reduces
their DEFENSE.
name: RUBBER BAND
note:
<is Toy>
<IconIndex:69>

<follow action>
 if target.isStateAffected(99) 
   add state 100: target
   remove state 99: target
 else if target.isStateAffected(98) 
   add state 99: target
   remove state 98: target
 else 
   add state 98: target
end
if !target._noStateMessage
animation 219: target
wait for animation
eval: const ttarget = BEAF.get_entity(target.name()); BattleManager._logWindow.push("addText", BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['DEFENSE_STAT'] + BEAF.get_determiner('AP', ttarget) + ttarget.TRANSLATION + ' baisse.')
else
eval: Gamefall.OmoriFixes.parseNoStateChange(BEAF.get_entity(target.name()), 'DEFENSE', "lower")
end
</follow action>
<AntiFail>

description:
Actually dangerous...
Deals heavy damage to all foes.
name: DYNAMITE

description:
Little fires.
Inflicts HAPPY on a friend or foe.
name: SPARKLER
note:
<is Toy>
<IconIndex:22>

<After Eval>
if(target.isEmotionAddable("happy")){
if(target.isStateAffected(6)) {target.addState(7)}
else if(target.isStateAffected(7)) {target.addState(8)}
else {target.addState(6)}
target.result().success = true;
} else {
for (const line of Gamefall.OmoriFixes.parseNoEffectEmotion(target, "happier")) {BattleManager._logWindow.addText(line)}
target.result().success = true;
}
</After Eval>

<Enemy or Actor Select>

description:
Small squares of colorful paper.
Inflicts HAPPY on all friends.
name: CONFETTI
note:
<is Toy>
<IconIndex:30>
<After Eval>
if(target.isEmotionAddable("happy")){
target.removeStateCategoryAll("ANGRY")
target.removeStateCategoryAll("SAD")
target.removeStateCategoryAll("AFRAID")
if(target.isStateAffected(6)) {target.addState(7)}
else if(target.isStateAffected(7)) {target.addState(8)}
else {target.addState(6)}
target.result().success = true;
}
</After Eval>

description:
Sad words strung together.
Inflicts SAD on a friend or foe.
name: POETRY BOOK
note:
<is Toy>
<IconIndex:38>
<After Eval>
if(target.isEmotionAddable("sad")){
if(target.isStateAffected(10)) {target.addState(11)}
else if(target.isStateAffected(11)) {target.addState(12)}
else {target.addState(10)}
target.result().success = true;
} else {
for (const line of Gamefall.OmoriFixes.parseNoEffectEmotion(target, "sadder")) {BattleManager._logWindow.addText(line)}
target.result().success = true;
}
</After Eval>
<Enemy or Actor Select>

<IconIndex:46>

<After Eval>

target.removeStateCategoryAll("ANGRY")
target.removeStateCategoryAll("AFRAID")

else if(target.isStateAffected(11)) {target.addState(12)}
else {target.addState(10)}

target.removeStateCategoryAll("SAD")
target.removeStateCategoryAll("AFRAID")
if(target.isStateAffected(14)) {target.addState(15)}

target.result().success = true;
} else {

<IconIndex:62>
<After Eval>
if(target.isEmotionAddable("angry")){
target.removeStateCategoryAll("HAPPY")
target.removeStateCategoryAll("SAD")
target.removeStateCategoryAll("AFRAID")
if(target.isStateAffected(14)) {target.addState(15)}

description:
Has a calming effect.
Removes EMOTION from a friend or foe.
name: DANDELION
note:
<Remove State Category: EMOTION>
<is Toy>
<IconIndex:70>
<AntiFail>

<Enemy or Actor Select>

<target action>
SE: BA_calm_down, 90, 100, 0
wait: 25
if target.isAnyEmotionAffected(true)
eval: const ttarget = BEAF.get_entity(target.name()); BattleManager.addText(ttarget.TRANSLATION + ' se ' + BEAF.VERBS['FEEL'][ttarget.NUMBER] + ' ' + BEAF.EMOTIONS['NEUTRAL'][ttarget.GENDER][ttarget.NUMBER] + '.')
else
eval: BattleManager.addText(BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['NO_EFFECT'])
end
evaL: target.removeStateCategoryAll("HAPPY")
evaL: target.removeStateCategoryAll("SAD")
evaL: target.removeStateCategoryAll("ANGRY")
evaL: target.removeStateCategoryAll("AFRAID")
</target action>

description:
Can't wait to be eaten!
Makes a friend slightly stronger.
name: MUSH

description:
Infused with the spirit of life.
Revives a friend that is TOAST.
name: LIFE JAM
note:
<IconIndex:15>

<damage formula>
if(!$gameParty.inBattle()) {
AudioManager.playSe({name:"BA_life_jam_1",volume:100,pitch:100, pan:0})
}
if(target.isStateAffected(198))
value = b.mhp
else
value = b.mhp * .5
</damage formula>

<target action>
eval: $gameTemp._noTarget = !target
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
wait for effect
</target action>

<follow action>
if $gameTemp._noTarget
eval: SceneManager._scene._logWindow.push("addText", BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['NO_EFFECT'])
eval: SceneManager._scene._logWindow.push("waitForNewLine")
eval: $gameTemp._noTarget = undefined
end
</follow action>

description:
Bitter bean juice.
Increases a friend's SPEED.
name: COFFEE
note:
<IconIndex:39>

<whole action>
add state 103: target
remove state 102: target
remove state 101: target
eval: const ttarget = BEAF.get_entity(target.name()); BattleManager.addText(BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['SPEED_STAT'] + BEAF.get_determiner('AP', ttarget) + ttarget.TRANSLATION + BEAF.BATTLE_TEXT['STAT_UP'])
animation 214: target
wait for animation
</whole action>
